titleStmt.title: Admirable curiosities, rarities, & wonders in England, Scotland, and Ireland, or, An account of many remarkable persons and places ... and other considerable occurrences and accidents for several hundred years past together with the natural and artificial rarities in every county ... as they are recorded by the most authentick and credible historians of former and latter ages : adorned with ... several memorable things therein contained, ingraven on copper plates / by R.B., author of the History of the wars of England, &c., and Remarks of London, &c.
titleStmt.author: R. B., 1632?-1725?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Snowden for Nath. Crouch ...,

notesStmt.note: R.B. stands for Richard or Robert Burton, the pseudonym of Nathaniel Crouch.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
